name: BEASTVANIA
description:
In BEASTVANIA, you wake up one day only to see that you're surrounded by rocks and spikes.

 - Jump and avoid all the obstacles that get in your way.

 - Eat weird power ups and transform into other beings to get through hazardous landscapes.

- Reach the end of this story to understand what you really are.

Game made by:

@SatTokifu (Art, Music, UI Design)

@GallarteJoel (Programming)
